title: x/time/rate: use context package from Go 1.7+
body:
Hope this is the right place to ask this question.

Could anybody provide some timeline on switching [`golang.org/x/net/context`](https://github.com/golang/time/blob/master/rate/rate.go#L14)  to `context`?
When would this happen?

Reference
- https://github.com/golang/time/blob/master/rate/rate.go#L14
- https://github.com/coreos/etcd/issues/6174

Thanks!
